thread.title: Comment on If You’re Going To Get A Dog Make Sure You Don’t Get These 10 Breeds by xcwilley
thread.title_full: Comment on If You’re Going To Get A Dog Make Sure You Don’t Get These 10 Breeds by xcwilley

author: xcwilley
title: Comment on If You’re Going To Get A Dog Make Sure You Don’t Get These 10 Breeds by xcwilley
text:
Bull breeds are clearly not to be trusted… 
with your heart!! 
Because they will totally steal it. 5. Rottweiler 
And Rottweilers? Just look at them! 
They’re always up to no good. 6. Pug 
There’s a lot of reasons you shouldn’t get a Pug. You can see it in their face.. 
They make funny faces at you… 
And steal your food without even asking! 7. Chihuahua 
We all know Chihuahuas should be avoided at all costs… 
They’ll take over your blankets… 
And distract you from very important things. 8. French Bulldog 
And if you think Chihuahuas are bad… 
French Bulldogs are the worst of the worst! 9. Labradoodles 
If you’ve been thinking about getting a Labradoodle… 
Here’s your chance to see why you shouldn’t.. 
That face? Those eyes? They aren’t the sweet animals we thought they once were! 10. Great Dane 
Great Danes are obviously too big to be pets. I mean, they’re basically like humans. 
You seriously want to love… 
one of these giant beasts??? 
Please adopt a dog from your nearest animal shelter! Every dog deserves a warm home and a human to love them.
